full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 41 of 261 1181
LC6Cmax1
Kate - direct
1 Q. And what was Epstein doing when you arrived?
2 A. He was sitting in a chair and he was on the phone talking quite loudly.
3 
4 Q. Did Epstein stay on the phone the entire time you were at Maxwell's townhouse?
5 
6 A. No.
7 Q. Did there come a time when Epstein got off the phone?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. What, if anything, did Maxwell say to Epstein about you during that visit?
10 
11 A. She said this is the girl that I told you about and she listed some of my accolades and said, you know, about me going to -- possibly going to Oxford, but that I was also a really talented singer, that I was really athletic, and that I was strangely strong for my size.
12 
13 
14 
15 Q. You mentioned your size. What was your size at the time?
16 
17 A. I was about 95 pounds.
18 Q. What happened next?
19 A. Next, after she said that I was very strong, she said why don't you give his feet a little squeeze to show him how strong you are.
20 
21 
22 Q. Did you give his feet a little squeeze?
23 A. Yes.
24 Q. When you say that you gave his feet a little squeeze, what does that mean?
25 
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00012792

23 A. Yes.

25
